text: Ke kaloku abo bakha iMasjid beyakhela ukona nokungakholwa nokwenza iyantlukwano kumakholwa nokuba ibe sisikhululo semikhosi yabo benza imfazwe ngokuchasene noAllâh noMthunywa waKhe (uMuhammad) kumathuba angaphambili, baza bafunga bathi injongo yabo ayinto yimbi ngaphandle kokwenza okulungileyo. Ke Yena uAllâh Unika ubungqina bokuba bangamaxoki okwenene
